translation.en: But tonight, I have failed massively.
translation.ja: でも今夜 しくじったよ

translation.en: Because a fine young man was abducted under my watch.

translation.en: -That's on me. -No.

translation.en: How can I help you?

translation.en: You just did help me by listening to my story.
translation.ja: もう話を聞いてくれた

translation.en: Be careful today. Danger is afoot.

translation.en: Oh, well, I don't worry about me. I worry about my kids.

translation.en: Called home. None of 'em picked up.
translation.ja: 家に電話しても出ない

translation.en: They're probably just watching a movie, though, and… -Tommy's keeping an eye on them. -Tommy?

translation.en: I'm sure he's been there the whole time. Without a doubt.
translation.ja: トミー？きっと妹たちを見てるよ

translation.en: The night is young. Appreciate you being nice to me.
translation.ja: 君の親切さに感謝する

translation.en: Of course, Hubie. You're the best person I know.
translation.ja: あなたは誰よりも優しい人だもの

translation.en: You're always thinking of everyone else and never of yourself.

translation.en: But I guess that's why you're a hero.

translation.en: Did you see how scared Scooby was when that car started moving? [laughing]

translation.en: -With his ping-pong paddle at the ready! -Oh, my God!

translation.en: What a buffoon!

translation.en: [mocking Hubie's voice] Mr. Hennessy! Mr. Hennessy!

translation.en: There's somebody in the road.
translation.ja: 人かいるぞ

translation.en: -Who the hell is that? -It's not moving.

translation.en: Looks like a dummy.
translation.ja: 動かないな　マネキンか

translation.en: You look like a dummy. Go out and get it out of the way.
translation.ja: どかしてきてよ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Now, see, that does it for me.
translation.ja: それは興奮する

translation.en: You like that?
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: いいえ

translation.en: Scarecrow?

translation.en: Lester!
translation.ja: レスター！

translation.en: Lester!
translation.ja: レスター

translation.en: I'm gonna kick your ass for this, Lester.
translation.ja: 私を脅かす気？

translation.en: I swear to God, if you jump out of one of these bushes, I'm gonna punch you in the face!
translation.ja: 茂みから出てきたらパンチを食らわせるわ

translation.en: What the--
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: Lester!
translation.ja: レスター！

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.ja: どこ？

translation.en: [Hubie] Valentine family, where are you?

translation.en: I'm coming! Danielle! Cooky!

translation.en: I say, "Marco." You say, "Polo." Marco!
translation.ja: 僕が“マルコ”と言ったら“ポーロ”と

translation.en: [man 1] Weirdo!
translation.ja: 変人め！

translation.en: Marco!
translation.ja: マルコ！

translation.en: [man 2] Asshole!
translation.ja: クズ！

translation.en: Hubie Dubois! Is that you?
translation.ja: ヒュービー！　あなたなの？

translation.en: [Walter] Oh! You must be Mrs. Dubois! I'm Walter!
translation.ja: デュボワさん？私はウォルターだ

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Walter.
translation.ja: はじめまして

translation.en: It's a shame what they've done to your lawn!
translation.ja: ひどいザマですね

translation.en: Happens every year!

translation.en: Not tonight!
translation.ja: 勘弁しろ

translation.en: We need to talk.

translation.en: [Tommy] They're not up here.

translation.en: [Megan] They're not down here, either.
translation.ja: ここにも

translation.en: Danielle!
translation.ja: ダニエル

translation.en: Cooky!
translation.ja: クッキー

translation.en: -We didn't find them. -Hey! It's okay. We'll figure it out. -We'll find them. -[pounding at door]
translation.ja: 落ち着いて　絶対に見つかる

translation.en: What are we screaming at?

translation.en: -Bam. -Mr. Dubois, I screwed up.

translation.en: -I can't find my sisters. -You don't know where the kids are? Huh.

translation.en: 'Cause I do. They're right here.
translation.ja: 捜してるのか？　ここにいる

translation.en: -[girls] Tommy! Tommy! -Oh, my God!

translation.en: I'm so sorry I left guys. I'm so glad you're okay.

translation.en: You are so cute with them.

translation.en: You have a girlfriend?

translation.en: I saw 'em coming through the Old McMillan shortcut.

translation.en: It was funny, 'cause not many people know where that shortcut is.
translation.ja: マクミラン家の近道を歩いてたんだ 僕とリッチーくらいしか知らない道なのにね

translation.en: Just me and a friend of mine, Richie Hartman. When I was a kid,
translation.ja: 僕とリッチーくらいしか知らない道なのにね

translation.en: we used to finish our band practice and shoot right through there.
translation.ja: 昔 バンドの練習後に彼とよく歩いた

translation.en: -Well, at least everybody's safe. -No one in Salem is safe tonight.
translation.ja: 全員 無事だ いいや　今夜は危険だぞ

translation.en: Do you understand me, Tommy? That's why I'm putting this family on lockdown.
translation.ja: いいや　今夜は危険だぞ もう家から出るな

translation.en: Now, Tommy, you call your mother. Let her know you're home.
translation.ja: トミー　お母さんに電話を

translation.en: Megan, you call your parents. Let them know you're staying at a friend's. That's for you.
translation.ja: メーガンも両親に連絡するんだ

translation.en: You two, do me a favor. Eat all the candy you want, and then go straight to sleep.
translation.ja: 君たち２人はお菓子を食べて寝ろ

translation.en: And lock this door! No matter what, don't answer it!
translation.ja: 何があってもドアを開けるな

translation.en: What're you gonna do, Mr. Dubois?
translation.ja: あなたは？

translation.en: I'm gonna do what I do every October 31st.
translation.ja: 10月31日にやるべきことがある

translation.en: Make sure every citizen in this town is safe and protected.
translation.ja: この町の住人を守らなくては

translation.en: Um, but do you have a bathroom I could use? 'Cause I, uh…
translation.ja: その前にトイレを借りても？

translation.en: The soup kinda went right through me.
translation.ja: スープが来てるみたい

translation.en: Upstairs.
translation.ja: ２階です

translation.en: Toilet? Is it a big toilet?
translation.ja: トイレはデカい？

translation.en: 'Cause I got a lot to do.
translation.ja: 僕のウンコ デカいんだ

translation.en: I know that howl.
translation.ja: 遠ぼえ？

translation.en: Walter Lambert!
translation.ja: ウォルターだ

translation.en: The transformation is complete.
translation.ja: 変身完了か

translation.en: While I understand that you are now a mindless killing machine,
translation.ja: 凶暴な殺人鬼に変わったのは承知だが―

translation.en: I would like to speak with the human being that is deep down below your fur.
translation.ja: そのフサフサな毛の下には人間の心が残ってるはず

translation.en: Mr. Lambert.
translation.ja: ランバート…

translation.en: Walter.
translation.ja: ウォルター

translation.en: I cannot, in good faith, allow you to hurt another soul tonight,
translation.ja: どうか町の人々を傷つけないでくれ

translation.en: even though this is Halloween, and even though I know this is--

translation.en: Mr. Lambert, you're better than that.
translation.ja: ランバートさん　勘弁してよ

translation.en: You-- Did you really wanna defecate in front of me, sir?
translation.ja: 僕の前でウンコなんて

translation.en: Oh, now, you're eating it!
translation.ja: 食べてる！

translation.en: Is that Michael Mundi you're eating right now? Is he inside your feces?

translation.en: -[barking] -Mr. Lambert! Get over here!
translation.ja: ランバートさん　待て！

translation.en: [Hubie's voice] The only way to slay the beast is a silver bullet right between the eyes.

translation.en: Yo, dawg! That's my bullet!
translation.ja: 弾を返せ！

translation.en: Mr. Lambert? Mr. Lambert.
translation.ja: ランバートさん　どこ？

translation.en: Mr. Lambert?
translation.ja: ランバートさん

translation.en: Mr. Lambert. This is not your fault! You are cursed!
translation.ja: あなたは悪くないよ呪いのせいだ

translation.en: Hello.
translation.ja: 元気？

translation.en: Mommy! No! Help me, Mommy!
translation.ja: ママ！　助けて！

translation.en: Help me! Help me!
translation.ja: お願い！　助けて！

translation.en: -[man] And stay out! -[women laughing]
translation.ja: 二度と来るな！

translation.en: Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
translation.ja: よかったわ　超怖かった

translation.en: That was so terrifying!
translation.ja: 最高ね

translation.en: -That was even crazier than last year! -Yes!
translation.ja: 去年以上だったよ楽しかった

translation.en: -How much fun was that? -That was so much fun. [laughing]
translation.ja: 去年以上だったよ楽しかった 本当に

translation.en: It almost made me forget that I buried my father today.
translation.ja: 死んだ親父のことも忘れてた

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry.
translation.ja: お気の毒に

translation.en: No, it's a good thing. I mean, not for him so much,
translation.ja: 平気だよ 親父の死は ある意味いい機会になった

translation.en: but it's given me time to be introspective.
translation.ja: 親父の死は ある意味いい機会になった 自分を振り返るための

translation.en: -That's good. -I'm Pete Landolfa.
translation.ja: ランドルファだ

translation.en: Oh, I'm Chantal. -Chantal? -Yeah.
translation.ja: シャンタルよ

translation.en: Come to me.
translation.ja: 来てくれ

translation.en: Walter. Come!
translation.ja: ウォルター　来い！

translation.en: Here, Walter.
translation.ja: ウォルター

translation.en: I don't wanna do this.
translation.ja: 許してくれ

translation.en: You've been a very good neighbor to me. But what has to be done, has to be done.

translation.en: Right between…
translation.ja: あなたの眉間に―

translation.en: the eyes!
translation.ja: これを！

translation.en: Oh, no. -[dog barks] -No!
translation.ja: ウソだろ　待ってくれ！

translation.en: Homeboy. Are you okay, man?
translation.ja: おい　大丈夫か？

translation.en: -Dude. -No! This is not real. You get that, right?

translation.en: We're just trying to raise money for our school.
translation.ja: 学校の慈善活動よ

translation.en: Wait a second. -Are you hittin' on me? -[laughing]
translation.ja: 待ってよ　口説いてるの？

translation.en: Because if so, that is incredibly sick.
translation.ja: そうならキモいわ

translation.en: We're having a conversation.
translation.ja: ただの会話だよ

translation.en: Mm-mmm. 'Cause you're, like, three times my age, okay?

translation.en: Thrice. I was born around the same time you had your first heart bypass.
translation.ja: 最初のバイパス手術の時に私が生まれた

translation.en: -[dog barks] -Oh, Buster! Hey, my big boy.
translation.ja: バスター！どこ行ってたの？

translation.en: Are you here to protect me from this weirdo man that's trying to hit on me?
translation.ja: このキモい人から守りに来たのね

translation.en: [screaming] My eyes are on fire!
translation.ja: チクショウ！　超痛い！

translation.en: -Why would you mace me? -Yo. I'm a dentist. I help people!

translation.en: Liar! Lucifer!
translation.ja: なんで催涙スプレーを？歯科医で善人だぞ ウソつきめ！

translation.en: [laughing] That sounds like Hubie Dubois.
translation.ja: ヒュービーの声だな

translation.en: And since I struck out with you, I'm gonna take it out on him.
translation.ja: 君にフラれたから八つ当たりしてくる

translation.en: Have fun with that.
translation.ja: 好きにして

translation.en: You gotta be-- Whoa. [chuckles]

translation.en: There's this goof headed his way. Hubie Dubois.
translation.ja: あのバカがここに向かってる

translation.en: When he gets here, I'll handle the scaring. You just sit back and enjoy. [snickers]

translation.en: [Hubie] Attention, haunted house patrons. This is a direct order from the AUU.
translation.ja: 幽霊屋敷にいる皆さんＡＵＵからの命令だ

translation.en: Move quickly and quietly toward the exits. The man-wolf has eaten his kryptonite!

translation.en: Pubie!
translation.ja: ブービー！

translation.en: Oh, my God. This is a travesty.
translation.ja: 大惨事になってしまった

translation.en: First, Mike Mundi. Now, Mr. Landolfa.
translation.ja: マイクの次はランドルファさん

translation.en: And why would God do this to such good people?
translation.ja: 善人たちを襲ってる

translation.en: Good people? All those two ever did was abuse you, man.
translation.ja: 善人？あんたに悪事ばかりしてる

translation.en: You know who should feel bad right now? Our wonderful mayor.
translation.ja: 一番 後悔すべきなのは市長よ

translation.en: I'm truly sorry.
translation.ja: 後悔してる

translation.en: You knew that high school kid from the corn maze was missing.
translation.ja: 誘拐のことを知ってて黙ってた

translation.en: -But you told nobody. -Yeah. Bad for business, I guess.

translation.en: Oh, they just found Lester Hennessy's car abandoned in the middle of Whipstick Road.
translation.ja: ヘネシーの車が乗り捨てられてた

translation.en: -No sign of Lester or Mary. -No!
translation.ja: 妻の姿もない 何？

translation.en: So, we are cancelin' the fireworks and all other related Halloween activities.
translation.ja: 花火も他のイベントも中止に

translation.en: -Officer Steve. -Not now, Hubie.

translation.en: -I think I know who did it. -Oh, so do I.
translation.ja: 犯人を知ってる 俺もだ

translation.en: His name…
translation.ja: 名前は…

translation.en: is Walter Lambert.
translation.ja: Ｗ･ランバート

translation.en: -Walter who? -Lambert.
translation.ja: 誰？ ランバート

translation.en: Scientists would call him a lyco-thorpe.
translation.ja: 科学者は彼を“浪人”と呼ぶ

translation.en: I think he means a lycanthrope.
translation.ja: “狼人”ね

translation.en: -Is that what it is? -It's a werewolf.
translation.ja: 狼人？ オオカミ男

translation.en: -Okay. -Hubie, I will lock you up.
translation.ja: そう 邪魔するな　４人も消えた

translation.en: -I got four people missing here. -Officer Steve, listen to me.
translation.ja: 邪魔するな　４人も消えた 話を聞いて

translation.en: I saw the man destroy his home earlier today.
translation.ja: 今朝 彼が家を壊してたんだ

translation.en: Then I saw him in the pumpkin patch.
translation.ja: カボチャ畑では―

translation.en: His shirt was torn up. He was barking at the moon.
translation.ja: 服が破れてて月に向かってほえてた

translation.en: His arms were very, very hairy.
translation.ja: 腕は毛むくじゃら

translation.en: Then I saw him at this haunted house, his tail wagging in murderous glee.
translation.ja: 人殺しを楽しむかのように尻尾を振ってた

translation.en: -Wait, you talking about my dog, Buster. -That was Walter Lambert!
translation.ja: 私の犬のこと？ ランバートだ！

translation.en: Where does he live?
translation.ja: 住所は？

translation.en: Fifty-Nine Elm Street. Check on it. -There's your killer. -[man on phone] Salem PD.
translation.ja: エルム通り59だ人殺しがいる

translation.en: Blake, I need you to go out to 59 Elm.
translation.ja: エルム通り59に出動を

translation.en: There should be a guy there. New in town. Possibly shirtless.
translation.ja: 服を着てない男がいるはずだ

translation.en: Yeah. Middle-aged, growls a lot, glue-on hairy hands?
translation.ja: 中年で よくうなる毛深い男？

translation.en: Yeah, I got him right here. Him and your boy, Richie Hartman.
translation.ja: ここにいるぞ　リッチーもな

translation.en: They both came by and turned themselves in, like, 45 minutes ago.
translation.ja: 45分ほど前に出頭してきた

translation.en: Together?
translation.ja: 一緒に？

translation.en: Yeah. Apparently, Lambert is Hartman's roommate at the mental hospital.
translation.ja: ２人は精神科病院で同室だったらしい

translation.en: Sorry. Werewolf Treatment Center.
translation.ja: 失礼　狼人治療施設で

translation.en: Lambert broke out about a month ago, and then Hartman broke out yesterday
translation.ja: １ヵ月前ランバートが脱走し―

translation.en: to try to find him and convince him to come back. It's actually pretty sweet, isn't it?
translation.ja: 彼を施設に戻すためにハートマンが追った

translation.en: So, you've had eyes on them for 45 minutes?
translation.ja: ずっと２人を見てた？

translation.en: [Blake] Almost, like, an hour now.
translation.ja: １時間ほど

translation.en: And also, Lambert's real name is Nick Hudson. Yeah. Walter Lambert
translation.ja: ランバートの実名はニック･ハドソン

translation.en: is just some name that he got off a tombstone on his way into town.
translation.ja: 墓地で見かけた名を名乗ってた

translation.en: All right, Blake. I got it. Thank you.
translation.ja: ブレイク　ありがとよ

translation.en: I feel bad you got yourself in even more trouble just to save me.
translation.ja: 面倒に巻き込んですまないな

translation.en: No, it was good to get out of that place for a while.
translation.ja: いいんだよ外に出て気分転換になった

translation.en: -You did me a favor. Thank you. -Did you do anything fun?
translation.ja: いいんだよ外に出て気分転換になった 外で何した？

translation.en: I pissed on a tombstone, pissed on the street.
translation.ja: 墓石に小便 通りに小便

translation.en: Just some fun pissing stuff, you know.
translation.ja: 主に立ちションだよ

translation.en: -Nobody pees more than you. -I'm peein' now.
translation.ja: よく小便するよな 今もしてる

translation.en: -That's a good roommate. Yes. [chuckles] -[sniffing, panting]
translation.ja: 俺の同居人　いい子だな

translation.en: -Who's a good roommate? Yes. Yes. -[barking] [Hartman chuckling] Yes, you are.
translation.ja: お前は本当に お利口だよ

translation.en: Lambert and Hartman have been in custody during the whole Landolfa disappearance.
translation.ja: ランドルファが消えた時２人は署にいた

translation.en: So, it couldn't have been them.
translation.ja: 犯人は別にいる

translation.en: -[dog whimpers] -Buster, my baby!
translation.ja: バスター　来たのね

translation.en: Oh, by the way, he ate a silver bullet if you wanna check his feces tomorrow.
translation.ja: 弾丸を食べたからウンコを確認して

translation.en: I ain't doin' that.
translation.ja: しないわ

translation.en: Then who? Are there any clues?
translation.ja: なら誰だ？　手がかりは？

translation.en: Landolfa did go back into the haunted house to look for Hubie.
translation.ja: ランドルファは彼を捜しに幽霊屋敷へ

translation.en: Yeah. Hubie seems to be around a lot of people before they go missing.
translation.ja: 確かにな君は他の３人とも会ってる

translation.en: -People who have messed with him. -Did the Hennesseys mess with Hubie, too?
translation.ja: 彼らに復讐(ふくしゅう)を？ ヘネシー夫妻は…

translation.en: Oh, they live for it.
translation.ja: イタズラ好き

translation.en: So, it was payback time. Wasn't it, Hubie?
translation.ja: ヒュービー復讐したんだな？

translation.en: No, I would never hurt anybody. I--
translation.ja: 違うよ　僕は誰も傷つけない

translation.en: You got the wrong guy.
translation.ja: 人違いだ

translation.en: -Father Dave. -Have you been planning this all along?
translation.ja: 神父 計画的な犯行だな？

translation.en: -[snarling] -You sick man.
translation.ja: イカれてる

translation.en: -Have you? -I--
translation.ja: 答えろ

translation.en: Have you?
translation.ja: そうなのか？

translation.en: Frankenstein!
translation.ja: フランケン！

translation.en: Did we just fall for the old Frankenstein trick?
translation.ja: 古いだまし方に引っかかった

translation.en: -[Aurora] Bad news, gang. -[thunderclap]
translation.ja: 悪い知らせよ

translation.en: WTCH has just learned that Salem's Halloween is getting shut down.
translation.ja: 花火大会が中止だというニュースが入ってきたわ

translation.en: [Aurora] The police department is advising everyone to stay home and lock doors.
translation.ja: 家に戻って鍵を閉めるよう警察が言ってる

translation.en: But, my little Halloweenies, we can all still celebrate
translation.ja: リスナーのみんな家で楽しみましょ

translation.en: with nature's fireworks lighting up the night sky.
translation.ja: 雷という自然の花火をね

translation.en: Not sure what's happening in this creepy town,
translation.ja: 何事なのかは不明だけど―

translation.en: but sounds like a good idea to cuddle up with someone special
translation.ja: 家でイチャつくのも悪くないわよ

translation.en: and enjoy the last half hour of Halloween under the covers.
translation.ja: 最後の30分はベッドの上で楽しんで

translation.en: And just hope that whoever you cuddling isn't a madman.

No. But there is a number that needs to be dialed immediately.

translation.ja: 身の危険を感じたら例の暗号を言え

translation.en: say the code word. At that point, we'll call the burner phone.

translation.en: Hubie. I would never hurt you.

translation.en: Always thinking of everyone else, never thinking of yourself.

translation.en: But I guess that's why you're a hero.

translation.en: [Landolfa] Hubie!

translation.en: Yes, he's Hubie. He's helpful.

translation.en: He's courteous, he's cheerful, he's considerate.

translation.en: What a bad, bad man.

translation.en: My great-great-great-great-great- grandmother laid down her life,

translation.en: trying to save innocent people.

translation.en: I was there.

translation.en: And my son did her one better. He just saved four ungrateful jackasses.

translation.en: Thanks, Pubie.

translation.en: Well, you can't even thank him without insulting him.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't know why I said Pubie. It just came out.

translation.en: Could it be because you feel threatened?

translation.en: I feel a lot of pressure to be cool all the time. I'm jealous of Hubie being able to be himself.

translation.en: Why should someone like Hubie have such a thick, luxuriant head of hair,

translation.en: and I look like a California raisin?

translation.en: I'm guessing… Hubie hasn't had a lot of sex.

translation.en: No, ma'am.

translation.en: Hasn't had any sex.

translation.ja: でも彼には希望がある

translation.en: I faked it for the doctors, but I'm really just dumb.

translation.en: I never really told anybody.

translation.en: You're probably all surprised.

translation.en: It pisses me off.

translation.en: Oh, 'cause of the dumb thing.

translation.en: My brother-in-law once said that I had no ambition.
translation.ja: 野望に欠けてると義兄に言われた

translation.en: And then he bit me, and I became a werewolf.
translation.ja: 彼に噛(か)まれてオオカミ男に

translation.en: You see?

translation.en: Hubie's smart, has nice hair, and sex hope.

translation.en: But to me, his best quality is this.

translation.en: He can weather all of your insults and your thrown objects,
translation.ja: 他人に どれほど罵られても―

translation.en: and he responds with humor and-- and kindness.

translation.en: Could you say the same?

translation.en: Could any of you take the abuse you dish out to my Hubie?

translation.en: I busted a guy for DWI last week, and, uh…

translation.en: he said it was an honor to be arrested by a Muppet.

translation.en: I acted like I didn't hear him. But then I cried in my squad car for about half an hour.

translation.en: You see, Hubie. True bravery's being kind.

translation.en: Even to those who are being cruel to you.

translation.en: I just always wanted to be as nice as you, Mom.

translation.en: Oh, you were nicer.

translation.en: But now I know that you're ready to spread your wings and fly without me.

translation.en: You don't have to be scared anymore.

translation.en: I'm feeling emotional.
